sentences.sContent: He tried to pass off a false Dagas on the auctioneer.
sentences.sContent_eng: He tried to pass off a false Dagas on the auctioneer.
sentences.sCn: 他试着把假的德加的画卖给拍卖人。

sentences.sContent: The most talkative is the least intelligent, and there is hardly a difference between an orator and an auctioneer.
sentences.sContent_eng: The most talkative is the least intelligent, and there is hardly a difference between an orator and an auctioneer.
sentences.sCn: 话最多的人是最不聪明的人，在一个演说家和一个拍卖人之间，几乎没有分别。

sentences.sContent: The auctioneer shall state the drawbacks of auction targets to the bidders.
sentences.sContent_eng: The auctioneer shall state the drawbacks of auction targets to the bidders.
sentences.sCn: 拍卖人应当向竞买人说明拍卖标的的瑕疵。

trans.tranOther: someone who is in charge of selling the things at an auction and who calls out how much money has already been offered for something
